line.comment: * Like the taxi, a cargo hauler can finish a job without being registered or piloted by the player.
* Keys are destinations (only one at the same time), values are an array of [0]{Ware} [1]$qty [2]$pay [3]$destination.

sval.val: Like the taxi, a cargo hauler can finish a job without being registered or piloted by the player.
Keys are destinations (only one at the same time), values are an array of [0]{Ware} [1]$qty [2]$pay [3]$destination.
